title: cryptorensics
author: cryptorensics
created_time: December 02, 2023, 08:09:15 AMLast edit: December 02, 2023, 09:18:26 AM by cryptorensics
content: Hi bitcointalk - communityIf you have been the victim of fraud, you can help us to resolve your fraud case.Data is the most important asset for our fraud investigations.If you provide us with data on your fraud case, you can help us with our investigations.A fraud report is of course completely free of charge for you.If you would like to support us in our investigations, please use the following form to submit your fraud report:https://www.cryptorensics.com/en/report-scam/Please read the instructions for reporting fraud on the website carefully.If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us using the contact form on the website.Thank you for your assistance,the entire Cryptorensics - Team

comments.author: stafstor
comments.body: Thank you for your initiative. Please check this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460649.0 And also other topics in which it's told about Freewallet scam.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: There's no need to open a new announcement you already have an existing announcement here Report scam (free of charge) and support investigationsYou've just copy-pasted everything here, and besides this section is for scam accusations there are formats to be followed here just let your topic remain in the project development or move it to the service discussionQuote from: stafstor on December 02, 2023, 06:29:50 PMThank you for your initiative. Please check this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460649.0 And also other topics in which it's told about Freewallet scam. Be sure to read the link the discussion on the link I provided if you think that it's free it's not.

comments.author: cryptorensics
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on December 03, 2023, 02:31:48 AMBe sure to read the link the discussion on the link I provided if you think that it's free it's not.There are no costs for submissions via the "report scam" function, ever.The statement about costs refers to our description on our website under "how we work".However, this is a description of the costs for investigations on behalf of clients.These have nothing to do with the "report scam" function, which is absolutely free of charge!Quote from: Saisher on December 03, 2023, 02:31:48 AMThere's no need to open a new announcement you already have an existing announcement here...Sorry for posting here again, if the entry should not remain here, I ask an admin to remove it. I cannot delete it.

comments.author: cryptorensics
comments.body: Quote from: stafstor on December 02, 2023, 06:29:50 PMThank you for your initiative. Please check this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460649.0 And also other topics in which it's told about Freewallet scam. Thanks for the tip about Freewallet.I have read through the thread and this case could well be eligible for an investigation on our part.Have you yourself been affected by their suspected fraud?If so, it would be nice if you could tell us about your case using our "report scam" function.If you know anyone affected, you are also welcome to refer them to our function.I will also post the information about our "report scam" function in the Freewallet thread.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: cryptorensics on December 03, 2023, 04:07:50 AMSorry for posting here again, if the entry should not remain here, I ask an admin to remove it. I cannot delete it.Another thing is do not post successive posts you can edit your earlier post and just add additional info if you have something to add, and you don't have to delete this thread just lock it scroll down below your thread you can see the lock and move option.Please read this thread if you want to get acquainted with the forum rules. Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ
